alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Berkshire and northeastern Columbia Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lenox, or near Pittsfield, moving east at 80 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Lenox, New Lebanon, Becket, Dalton, Hinsdale, Canaan, Richmond, West Stockbridge, Peru, Washington, Barkerville, Mahkeenac Heights, Red Rock, Tanglewood, New Lenox, Lenox Dale, New Britain, The Boulders and The Center At Lenox. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
